 2008-07052008-04-11INDUSTRY,  ,  ,  , 
ActBusiness Development Bank of Canada Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Industry of SARAH E. RAISS of Calgary, Alberta, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Business Development Bank of Canada to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of Kelvin Ng, effective April 21, 2008.
AttachmentsAttachment
